info.name: Fixed Dark Stylus
info.description:
I got annoyed with the bright theme when you search for a new style with the add-on. With this style, I added a few rules that mainly fixes inline searching, but a few others as well.
Original style by CodyMKW: https://userstyles.org/styles/142272/dark-stylus
info.additionalInfo:
06/06/2018
-Smol improvements :P
29/03/2018
-Fixed super dark icons for editing/deleting styles from quick menu.
